definition: giving or marked by complete attention to, an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions
details:
adjective
- giving or marked by complete attention to
= synonyms: wrapped, captive, absorbed, engrossed, enwrapped
noun
- an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions
= example: an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions
= synonyms: intention
- the intended meaning of a communication
= synonyms: spirit, purport
